title: How to manage customer relationships | Customer Basics with Salesforceâ€™s Tiffani Bova | E1306
description: This Startup Basics is all about managing customer relationships. Tiffani Bova from Salesforce joins to talk about the ways startups can improve customer interactions, transforming one-time transactions to reoccurring relationships. Jason and Tiffani give practical tips better serve customers and keep them coming back.
